title: Adarikka vENum ayyanE arumukha
sahitya:
Adarikka vENum ayyanE arumukha nAthanE nI pEdaiyEn un padam paNiyum pOdu uDanE


anupallavi

  vEda svarUpa mayil mIdamarum mEdaiyE vEdap-poruL Odiyadai viLakkina vittaganE


caraNam    mAnila makkaLukku mOna guruvAgiyavar mukti pera aruLum shakti vaDivElanE
Ananda sAgaranAi anbarin sahAyanAi dIna dayALanAit-tigazhum shikhAmaNiyE
